document.full_text: humberto suazo's goal in the closing minute of the first half proved just enough for monterrey won the concacaf champions league and advanced to the fifa club world cup in december.
document.title: monterrey 1, real salt lake 0: suazo lifts monterrey past real salt lake
lines_and_colors: humberto suazo's goal in the closing minute of the first half proved just enough for monterrey won the concacaf champions league and advanced to the fifa club world cup in december.
